New Records: The 194 balls of spin was a record for Australia in a men's ODI.
Key Match Events: Ben Duckett struck his second ODI hundred.
Travis Head took 4 wickets for 28 runs.
A ferocious stand of 132 off 98 balls between Duckett and Brook.
Brydon Carse struck first ball to remove Head.
Josh Inglis hit consecutive sixes off Carse in the 20th over.
Phil Salt hit three boundaries off Mitchell Starc in the opening over.
Aaron Hardie took the wickets of Phil Salt and Will Jacks.
Pre-Game Insights: Ricky Ponting said Australia would rate a series win very highly given the challenges within the squad.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 20 overs per side.
Australia's spinners engineered a collapse in England's batting.
Steven Smith successfully reviewed being given lbw to Matthew Potts.
England missed reviewing for an edge off Josh Inglis at 122 for 2 in the 15th over.
